mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_code, c.member_code, c.quantity, g.goods_name, g.price, g.thumb_image FROM cart c JOIN goods g ON c.goods_code = g.goods_code WHERE c.member_code = #{memberCode}
mapper.update: update cart set quantity = #{quantity} where cart_code = #{cartCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO detail (detail_code, order_code, goods_code, quantity, detail_price) SELECT detail_seq.NEXTVAL, #{orderCode}, c.goods_code, c.quantity, g.price FROM cart c LEFT JOIN goods g ON c.goods_code = g.goods_code;
